mapper.select: SELECT info.order_no, info.order_time, detail.order_prod_no, detail.order_quantity, p.prod_name, p.prod_price FROM order_info info JOIN order_detail detail ON info.order_no = detail.order_no JOIN product p ON p.prod_no = detail.order_prod_no WHERE order_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_info(order_no, order_id, order_time) VALUES (order_seq.NEXTVAL, #{order_id}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO order_detail(order_no, order_prod_no, order_quantity) VALUES (order_seq.CURRVAL, #{product.prod_no}, #{order_quantity})
